–º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤–æ–π –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã.__This night Russia struck
with four rockets and hit 5-story house and hospital
in Selydove, Donetsk Oblast, 22 km from frontline.The
whole entrance of the house collapsed completely.
The hospital is also almost destroyed.By this
time there are 3 killed and 12 wounded. The killed
ones are 38-years-old pregnant woman, 36-years-old
woman and her 9-years-old son. Debris removing
operation continues.Footage from inside the hospital
shows rescuers who take out wounded - they are
women and elderly people from the hospital, among
them 6-month-old baby.
